name: The Babysitter
summary: An erotic text-based adventure game mady by AGT - Adventure Game Toolkit. 8 very simple rooms with 5 objets to manipulate. There are about 5 characters to interact with. The game commands are only west/east/noth/south/up/down open/take/give/examine and feel/rape/fuck/buttfuck. The game contains some serious bugs.
